{{Wireless embedded system |brand=HiWiFi |model=HC6361 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00E93Z720;CN; |price= |est_release_date=2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=China only ? |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL128SAIF00 |fla1_num= |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MT29F32G08CBACA |fla2_num= |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU5162ETR-E3C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=NAND Flash (32 Gb);Micron;MT29F32G08CBACA;29F32G08CBACA;1;,,, USB 2.0 Flash Disk controller;SkyMedi;SK6226;SK6226, BAPMC4, A1317, S6A432.2;1; |flags= |stock_os=Linux;3.10.36;; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HiWiFi_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HiWiFi_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.199.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=D4:EE:07 |oui_eth=D4:EE:07 }} [http://www.hiwifi.com/ Product page] (CN)
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hiwifi/hc6361 ''HiWiFi HC6361'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hiwifi/hc6361_old pictures]) :The Xtal frequency is 25MHz.
Additional storage (4 GB per the shown MT29F32G08CBACA NAND) is available :to the device via the on-board [http://www.skymedi.com.tw/chinese/P_Items.asp?P_ID=23&T_ID=2 SK6226] USB 2.0 (High-Speed) Flash controller.
OpenWrt based Source Code https://code.hiwifi.com/, note that is not original firmware. :Checkout code need register.
See also HiWiFi HC5661/HC5663/HC5761/HC6361..

USB data lines) File:HiWiFi HC6361 16 MB Flash (FL128SAIF00).jpg|16 MB NOR Flash chip File:HiWiFi HC6361 casing up.jpg|partially in of case </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
